feed.title: Hosted Private Cloud Status - Incident History

entry.title: [RBX][VMware Private Cloud] - Datastore maintenance notification
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Aug 11, 07:00 UTC  -  Aug 21, 16:00 UTC

Jul 11, 09:01 UTC
Update - This maintenance has been re-scheduled.
Below you can find new information regarding the operation.

As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Hosted Private Cloud offer.

This may temporarily affect availability.

Start time : 11/08/2025 07:00 UTC
End time : 21/08/2025 16:00 UTC
Service impact : You may experience a micro cut if the customer is writing a lot on their datastore.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will be doing a maintenance on multiple storage servers.

Thank you for your understanding.

Jul 2, 04:23 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Hosted Private Cloud offer.

This may temporarily affect availability.

Start time : 15/07/2025 07:00 UTC
End time : 17/07/2025 16:00 UTC
Service impact : You may experience a micro cut if the customer is writing a lot on their datastore.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will be doing a maintenance on multiple storage servers.

Thank you for your understanding.

entry.title: [EU/CA][Hosted Private Cloud] - vSphere maintenance notification
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Aug 4, 07:00 UTC  -  Aug 7, 16:00 UTC

Jul 9, 23:18 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Hosted Private Cloud offer.

This may temporarily affect availability.

Start time : 04/08/2025 07:00 UTC
End time : 07/08/2025 16:00 UTC
Service impact : During the maintenance, vSphere won't be accessible and hosts will be put in maintenance mode for 1 hour.
vMotion will be performed if it has Virtual machines in it.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will be doing a maintenance on our vSphere offer.
An individual communication will be done to inform customers.
Customers can reschedule the operation through the manager.

Thank you for your understanding

entry.title: [RBX8][VMware Private Cloud] - Hosts unreachable incident notification
entry.content:
Jul 23, 09:58 UTC
Update - We have new information regarding the incident that affected your service(s).

Please find below an update on the situation:
Update : The majority of the affected hosts have been restored and are operational since 05:00 UTC.
Ongoing Actions : The incident has been identified and our teams are mobilised to restore service as quickly as possible.

We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution.
We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

Jul 23, 04:57 UTC
Identified - We have determined the origin of the incident affecting our Managed VMware Cloud Director, which is causing temporary availability issues in the rack R804L20.

Here are some supplementary details :
Start time : 23/07/2025 03:41 UTC
Impacted Service(s) : Some hosts in the specified rack are unavailable.
Impacted customers : Some customers cannot access their hosts located in the specified rack.
Root Cause : This incident is caused by a cooling system issue.
Ongoing Actions : The incident has been identified and our teams are mobilised to restore service as quickly as possible.

We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution.
We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

Jul 23, 04:30 UTC
Investigating - We are currently experiencing an ongoing incident affecting our the VMware Private Cloud offer in rack R804L20.

Here are some supplementary details :
Start time : 23/07/2025 03:41 UTC
Impacted Service(s) : Some hosts in the specified rack are unavailable.
Impacted customers : Some customers cannot access their hosts located in the specified rack.
Ongoing Actions : Our teams are investigating to determine the origin of the incident to fix it.Â 

We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution.
We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

Our teams are fully committed to investigating this issue and working towards a resolution as soon as possible. As investigations are ongoing, we will share any new findings or updates with you as soon as possible.

Thank you for your understanding.
